daily_analysis.reasoning: Broader daily chart (30–50+ candles) shows a clear climb from lower-left to upper-right with higher highs and higher lows = uptrend. I inspected the most recent 20–30 candles on the right side and did not find a clear bullish engulfing candle at a nearby support zone within the current price area, so no valid swing-entry zone or pattern is present — recommend waiting for a bullish engulfing at a relevant support before taking a buy.

m30_analysis.reasoning: A clear bullish engulfing on the M30 is visible near the current price cluster — a large green candle that engulfs the prior red candle (body and most wicks). The marked zone is the wick-to-wick area of that pair (kept to ~2.0 price units = ~20 pips width to meet the 20–30 pip requirement). No Daily zone was provided, so it does not overlap a daily zone.

warnings: M30 pattern zone validation skipped (no price data)
